metadata.synopsis: An eccentric French countess (Katharine Hepburn) and her odd friends thwart a plot to drill for oil in Paris.

reviews: Fascinating star-studded mess, but a mess all the same.
A tremendously talky effort featuring a ton of stars. One of two films I tried to sit through, but couldn't.
He's taken Jean Giraudoux's late 1940s play, jacked it up with some easy references to nuclear testing and radical students, and attempted to pass it off as relevant.
